channel.title: Need help with 3 errors
channel.description: i tried to make a shop that requires all quests complete but i get these 3 errors illegal start of expression && (q7 == 15) (error is the 1 or the 1st &) not a statement (q5 == 15) && (error is 5 or the first &) ';' expected (q11 == 15){ (error is the closing bracket) here is the whole code [code]if(NPCID == 296){ if(q1 == 15) && (q2 == 15) && (q3 == 15) && (q4 == 15) && (q5 == 15) && (q6 == 15) && (q7 == 15) && (q8 == 15) && (q9 == 15) && (q10 == 15) && (q11 == 15){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43;[/code] can anyone help me?

the error: ‘;’ expected (q11 == 15){

if(NPCID == 296){
if(q1 == 15) && (q2 == 15) && (q3 == 15) && (q4 == 15) && (q5 == 15) && (q6 == 15) && (q7 == 15) && (q8 == 15) && (q9 == 15) && (q10 == 15) && (q11 == 15;){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 43;

or something. You need to put somehwere an “;”

item.title: Need help with 3 errors
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i tried to make a shop that requires all quests complete but i get these 3 errors
illegal start of expression
&&
(q7 == 15)
(error is the 1 or the 1st &)
not a statement
(q5 == 15)
&&
(error is 5 or the first &)
‘;’ expected (q11 == 15){
(error is the closing bracket)
here is the whole code

if(NPCID == 296){ if(q1 == 15) && (q2 == 15) && (q3 == 15) && (q4 == 15) && (q5 == 15) && (q6 == 15) && (q7 == 15) && (q8 == 15) && (q9 == 15) && (q10 == 15) && (q11 == 15){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43;
can anyone help me?
